text: The Metropolitan Opera Association is a big organization in New York City which puts on performances of opera. The Metropolitan Opera House (often simply called: The Met) is one of the most famous opera houses in the world. It was started in 1880. Today the music director is Yannick Nézet-Séguin. ==Other websites== * The Metropolitan Opera Category:Opera houses Category:Non-profit organizations of New York (state) Category:Organizations based in New York City Category:1880 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in New York (state) Category:Music in New York City
title: Metropolitan Opera
